    • Method Detail

      • hasPlayerData

        public static Boolean hasPlayerData(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Checks if the specified player has a data file.
        Parameters:
        player - The player to check
        Returns:
        true if they have a data file, else false.

      • hasLocationOneSaved

        public static Boolean hasLocationOneSaved(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Checks if the player has saved location 1. These locations are used for setting cuboid regions. Use hasLocationTwoSaved(Player) to check if the player has the second location saved.
        Parameters:
        player - The player to check.
        Returns:
        true if the player has location 1 saved, else false.

      • hasLocationTwoSaved

        public static Boolean hasLocationTwoSaved(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Checks if the player has saved location 2. These locations are used for setting cuboid regions. Use hasLocationOneSaved(Player) to check if the player has the first location saved.
        Parameters:
        player - The player to check.
        Returns:
        true if the player has location 2, else false.

      • getPlayerDataFile

        public static File getPlayerDataFile(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Gets the player's data file for NovaGames. Only if the player has one. Use getPlayerDataYml(Player) to get the player's data Yml.
        Parameters:
        player - The player to get.
        Returns:
        The player's NovaGames data file.

      • getPlayerDataYml

        public static org.bukkit.configuration.file.YamlConfiguration getPlayerDataYml(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Gets the player's data yml for NovaGames. Only if the player has one. Use getPlayerDataFile(Player) to get the player's data File.
        Parameters:
        player - The player to get.
        Returns:
        The player's NovaGames data yml.

      • hasArenaToolEnabled

        public static Boolean hasArenaToolEnabled(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Checks if the player has the arena tool (A stick) enabled for setting cuboid locations.
        Parameters:
        player - The player to check.
        Returns:
        true if enabled, else false.

      • getSaveLocationOne

        public static org.bukkit.Location getSaveLocationOne(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Gets location one that the player has saved. Be sure to use hasLocationOneSaved(Player) before to avoid null errors. Use getSaveLocationTwo(Player) to get the second location.
        Parameters:
        player - The player to check.
        Returns:
        Location one that the player has set.

      • getSaveLocationTwo

        public static org.bukkit.Location getSaveLocationTwo(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Gets location two that the player has saved. Be sure to use hasLocationTwoSaved(Player) before to avoid null errors. Use getSaveLocationOne(Player) to get the first location.
        Parameters:
        player - The player to check.
        Returns:
        Location two that the player has set.

      • setArenaToolEnabled

        public static void setArenaToolEnabled(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                       Boolean enabled)
        Sets whether or not the arena tool is enabled for the player.
        Parameters:
        player - The player to set.
        enabled - Whether or not the arena tool is enabled.

      • saveLocationOne

        public static void saveLocationOne(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                   org.bukkit.Location loc)
        Saves the location as location one for the specified player. Use saveLocationTwo(Player, Location) to save location two.
        Parameters:
        player - The player to set.
        loc - The location to set.

        loc - The location to set.

      • createPlayerData

        public static void createPlayerData(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Creates the player's NovaGames data file if one does not already exist.
        Parameters:
        player - The player to create a file for.

      • savePlayerData

        public static void savePlayerData(org.bukkit.configuration.file.YamlConfiguration dataYml,
                  File dataFile)
        Saves the player's data yml.
        Parameters:
        dataYml - The instance of the player data yml.
        dataFile - The player's data file: getPlayerDataFile(Player)

      • updatePlayerData

        public static void updatePlayerData(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Updates the player's data file with new values or fixes/removes old values. If a file does not exist, one will be created.
        Parameters:
        player - The player to update a file for.

      • deleteSaveLocationOne

        public static void deleteSaveLocationOne(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Deletes location one from the player's data file if it exists. Use deleteSaveLocationTwo(Player) to delete location two.
        Parameters:
        player - The player to delete the location from.

      • deleteSaveLocationTwo

        public static void deleteSaveLocationTwo(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Deletes location two from the player's data file if it exists. Use deleteSaveLocationOne(Player) to delete location one.
        Parameters:
        player - The player to delete the location from.

      • saveEnderchest

        public static void saveEnderchest(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Saves the player's enderchest to file. Only use if needed.
        Parameters:
        player - The player to save an enderchest from.

      • resetEnderchest

        public static void resetEnderchest(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Loads and updates the player's enderchest from file.
        Parameters:
        player - The player to get an enderchest for.
